title: The Harvest Protocol
subtitle: Beyond the Stars
description: Execute the Collective's grand design as you lead an alien expeditionary force to harvest this resource-rich world. Overcome primitive resistance and prepare the planet for full assimilation into the galactic network.
shortDescription: Lead an alien invasion force to harvest Earth for the Collective.

story.synopsis: The Collective has identified Earth as a prime harvesting target. As Overseer of the expeditionary fleet, you must establish forward bases, neutralize organized resistance, and prepare the planet for resource extraction.
story.prologue: For eons, the Collective has expanded across the galaxy, assimilating worlds and harvesting their resources. Earth was catalogued millennia ago as a future acquisition. Now, with the native species fragmenting into civil war, the time for harvest has come. The primitive inhabitants will serve the Collective - willingly or otherwise.
story.epilogue: Phase One is complete. The major population centers have been subdued, and harvesting operations proceed on schedule. Yet the Collective notes with interest that this species demonstrates... unexpected resilience. Perhaps they are worth more as subjects than as raw materials.
story.setting: Earth and the orbital Collective mothership
